## `arrange()`
Note: all the exercises of this section are based on the `flights` dataset.

```{r require, results='hide', message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(nycflights13)
```


### Exercise 1
Sort the flights in chronological order.

```{r ex1, echo=show_solution, eval=show_solution}
arrange(flights, year, month, day, hour, minute)
```


### Exercise 2
Sort the flights by decreasing arrival delay.

```{r ex2, echo=show_solution, eval=show_solution}
arrange(flights, desc(arr_delay))
```


### Exercise 3
Sort the flights by origin (in alphabetical order) and decreasing arrival delay.

```{r ex3, echo=show_solution, eval=show_solution}
arrange(flights, origin, desc(arr_delay))
```
